product.name: XSL-Pattern
product.changes: * XML whitespace specification followed (restricted to ISO Latin-1) * The pattern parser now recognizes XML namespaces (restricted to ISO Latin-1). However, namespace prefixes are not yet transformed into URI's as required by the XSL specification, because PyDOM does not yet support namespaces. * I am now convinced that the relation between the (XSL specified) select patterns and the (implemented) accept patterns is correct. * Slightly improved documentation
